article_title: Number of homeless students on rise in Washington state
article_text:
Percent of Whatcom County schoolchildren without homes virtually unchanged in past year

Percent of homeless students locally up by 25 percent since 2007-08

Lack of affordable housing and jobs could be among causes

article_metadata.news-keywords: homeless, students, school children, Whatcom, Bellingham, Ferndale, Blaine, Nooksack Valley, Mount Baker, Meridian, Lynden
article_metadata.description: The number of homeless schoolchildren grew by 9.1 percent statewide but was nearly unchanged in Whatcom County in the past year, according to new data from the state Office of Superintendent of Public Instruction.
article_metadata.title: Number of homeless students on rise in Washington state | Bellingham Herald
